import React, { useState } from 'react' import AliceCarousel from 'react-alice-carousel'; import "react-alice-carousel/lib/alice-carousel.css"; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function Home() { const [email, setEmail]= useState({ email:"", }) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleChange = (e)=>{ setEmail((prev)=> ({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } console.log(email) const handleClick = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() try{ await axios.post("http://localhost:8800/newsletter/",email) } catch(err){ } } return (
{/* Slider Carousel used react-alice-carousel module */}
{/* Newsletter */}

JOIN OUR SQUAD {/*
SQUAD */}

Sign up to receive exclusive offers and store updates first.

{/*
Book your escape
*/}
{/* */}
Yes, I would like to receive email communications{" "}
) }
